segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, and I’m amazed he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching so far, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and it’s like she doesn’t even see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don’t want to interrupt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so surprising to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know how anyone could be this unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR
